purpleculture_pinyin:
huái
bosom; heart; mind; to think of; to harbor in one's mind; to conceive (a child)
пазуха; сердце; разум; думать о; хранить в уме; зачать (ребенка)
rtega_mnemonic:
懷懷RS
怀怀		懐bosom, breast, carry in bosom
  • the heart 忄 is carried in the bosom 褱
  • ⓢ person crossing hands 不 to protect his heart 忄 located in the bosom
  • modf. 懷 → 懐
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 怀)
Pictophonetic: 褱 indicates the sound; 忄 (heart) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
懷疑 [ huái yí ]: to doubt (sth); to be skeptical of; to have one's doubts; to harbor suspicions; to suspect that
懷念 [ huái niàn ]: to cherish the memory of; to think of; reminisce
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right

    • 褱 [ huái ] to wrap, to conceal; to carry in one's bosom or up one's sleeve
heisig_chinese_memo: I used to hate winter but my state of mind has changed to cherish it. I put on my top hat and scarf and go outside to appreciate the snowflakes with my eyes.
Ru_trainchinese:
huái: (сущ) грудь
huái: (глаг) держать в уме; зачать (ребенка)
huái: (графема) ум, сердце; думать о, стремиться к
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Monks cherish having no state of mind at all.  They sit in mediation with tranquil empty heads.
humanum_full_description_en:
" pregnant " multi-word inscriptions written " Huai ", bamboo and silk add text to appear from the " heart " of the " pregnant ." Because " Huai " would have been with "tears in their clothes in the folder" Resentment borders on this kind of intention, then raise " heart next to" " pregnant ", he further sense of the chest that I embrace all sorts of thoughts or ideas meaning. "Wen said," that said: "pregnant, think also read from the heart, Huai sound.." Later, " Huai " word was gradually abandoned, and " pregnant " completely replace the word " Huai " word, it means that in addition to substance In addition to the "carrying" of meaning (such as "Huaiyu" and Huaibi"), it can also refer to the "carrying" of various abstract meanings.

The abstract usage of Huai is found everywhere in ancient Chinese books. Such as "Shang Shu. Yu Shu. "Gao Tao Mo": "An Min is benefited, and Li Min cherishes it" "Shang Shu. Commercial books. "Ixun": "Tolerate abuse on behalf of the abuser, Zhao the people and let them embrace"; "Shang Shu. Zhou Shu. The Life of Cai Zhong": "The emperor has no relatives, but virtue is auxiliary; the people's heart is impermanent, but the bosom of benefit"; "Shang Shu. Zhou Shu. "Jun Chen": "Old Masters of Zhou Dynasty protected the people, and the people cherished their virtues"; "Poetry. Bin Feng. "Dongshan": "Don't be afraid, Yi Kehuai"; "Book of Rites. "Xue Ji": "Those who are near persuade, and those who are far cherish it"; "The Analects. "Liren": "The gentleman cherishes virtue, the villain cherishes the earth; the gentleman cherishes punishment, the villain cherishes benefits" etc.

The bamboo slips of the Warring States period indicate pregnancy, "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Slips. "Closed Diagnosis Style" Jan. 84: "J is pregnant in June", which means that Jia has been pregnant for six months. "Mawangdui. The 23rd line of the "Pregnancy Book": "Pregnant child gives birth to a male." It is also called " bad ", which means destruction. Ji Kangzi asks about Confucius" Jane 22: "Have (destructed) destroyed".
humanum_short_description_en: Warring States bamboo from the " heart " from " Huai ", " Huai " is also a sound character, the original meaning is missed, see " Huai ."
humanum_full_description:
「懷」字金文多寫作「褱」，簡帛文字才出現加從「心」的「懷」。由於「褱」本來已帶有「衣中夾淚眼」這一種跡近幽怨的意向，後來加注「心」旁的「懷」，便更進一步意會了吾人胸中所懷抱的種種思想或意念的意思。《說文》即曰：「懷，念思也。從心，褱聲。」後來，「褱」字漸被棄用，而「懷」字全面取代了「褱」字，其除可指物質意義的「攜帶」（如「懷玉」、懷璧」）外，更可指各種抽象意義的「懷抱」。

　　懷字這種抽象的用法，於中國古籍中俯拾皆是。如《尚書．虞書．皋陶謨》：「安民則惠，黎民懷之」《尚書．商書．伊訓》：「代虐以寬，兆民允懷」；《尚書．周書．蔡仲之命》：「皇天無親，惟德是輔；民心無常，惟惠之懷」；《尚書．周書．君陳》：「昔周公師保萬民，民懷其德」；《詩．豳風．東山》：「不可畏也，伊可懷也」；《禮記．學記》：「近者說服，而遠者懷之」；《論語．里仁》：「君子懷德，小人懷土；君子懷刑，小人懷惠」等。

　　戰國竹簡表示懷孕，《睡虎地秦簡．封診式》簡84：「甲懷子六月矣」，意謂甲已懷孕六個月。《馬王堆．胎產書》第23行：「懷子產男」。又通假為「壞」，表示毁壞，《上博竹書五．季康子問於孔子》簡22：「懷(壞)毁」。
humanum_short_description: 戰國竹簡從「心」從「褱」，「褱」亦是聲符，本義是懷念，參見「褱」。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
懷 (Simplified: 怀)
Pinyin: huái
English Definition: bosom; heart; mind; to think of; to harbor in one's mind; to conceive (a child)
Total strokes: 19; Radical: 心
Pictophonetic: 褱 indicates the sound; 忄 (heart) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 忄 [ xīn ] heart; mind; soul
    • 褱 [ huái ] to wrap, to conceal; to carry in one's bosom or up one's sleeve
Example Words:
懷疑 [ huái yí ]: to doubt (sth); to be skeptical of; to have one's doubts; to harbor suspicions; to suspect that
懷念 [ huái niàn ]: to cherish the memory of; to think of; reminisce
More: 懷* | *懷 | *懷*

  • the heart 忄 is carried in the bosom 褱
  • ⓢ person crossing hands 不 to protect his heart 忄 located in the bosom
  • modf. 懷 → 懐
(Simplified: 怀)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 褱 indicates the sound; 忄 (heart) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 忄 [ xīn ] heart; mind; soul
    • 褱 [ huái ] to wrap, to conceal; to carry in one's bosom or up one's sleeve
①思念，想念：懷念。懷舊。懷鄉。懷古。緬懷。
②包藏：懷胎。心懷鬼胎。胸懷壯志。懷瑾握瑜。懷才不遇。
③胸前：懷抱。抱在懷裏。
④心中意：心懷。胸懷。正中(zhòng)下懷。耿耿於懷。
⑤安撫：懷柔。
⑥歸向，使降順：“懷敵附遠，何招而不至？”
懷疑 [ huái yí ]: to doubt (sth); to be skeptical of; to have one's doubts; to harbor suspicions; to suspect that
懷念 [ huái niàn ]: to cherish the memory of; to think of; reminisce
(Simplified: 怀)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 褱 indicates the sound; 忄 (heart) conveys the meaning.
HSK: 4
Chinese: I used to hate winter but my state of mind has changed to cherish it. I put on my top hat and scarf and go outside to appreciate the snowflakes with my eyes.
Meaning: cherish
Hanzi: 怀
Story: Monks cherish having no state of mind at all. They sit in mediation with tranquil empty heads.
Kind: traditional

「 懷 」字金文多寫作「 褱 」，簡帛文字才出現加從「 心 」的「 懷 」。由於「 褱 」本來已帶有「衣中夾淚眼」這一種跡近幽怨的意向，後來加注「 心 」旁的「 懷 」，便更進一步意會了吾人胸中所懷抱的種種思想或意念的意思。《說文》即曰：「懷，念思也。從心，褱聲。」後來，「 褱 」字漸被棄用，而「 懷 」字全面取代了「 褱 」字，其除可指物質意義的「攜帶」（如「懷玉」、懷璧」）外，更可指各種抽象意義的「懷抱」。 懷字這種抽象的用法，於中國古籍中俯拾皆是。如《尚書．虞書．皋陶謨》：「安民則惠，黎民懷之」《尚書．商書．伊訓》：「代虐以寬，兆民允懷」；《尚書．周書．蔡仲之命》：「皇天無親，惟德是輔；民心無常，惟惠之懷」；《尚書．周書．君陳》：「昔周公師保萬民，民懷其德」；《詩．豳風．東山》：「不可畏也，伊可懷也」；《禮記．學記》：「近者說服，而遠者懷之」；《論語．里仁》：「君子懷德，小人懷土；君子懷刑，小人懷惠」等。 戰國竹簡表示懷孕，《睡虎地秦簡．封診式》簡84：「甲懷子六月矣」，意謂甲已懷孕六個月。《馬王堆．胎產書》第23行：「懷子產男」。又通假為「 壞 」，表示毁壞，《上博竹書五．季康子問於孔子》簡22：「懷(壞)毁」。

懷字的基本解释

懷
huái
见“怀”。

懷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huái］
［《廣韻》户乖切，平皆，匣。］
亦作“懐1”。“怀1”的繁体字。“褢1”的今字。
(1)怀念；思念。
(2)引申为留恋，爱惜。
(3)怀恨。
(4)胸前；怀抱里。
(5)包容；包围。
(6)胸怀；怀抱。
(7)怀藏。
(8)指心中存有。
(9)隐藏；隐忍。
(10)孕，怀孕。
(11)情意；心意。
(12)指心内，心中。
(13)归向。
(14)引申为来，至。
(15)招致，招徕。
(16)安；安抚。
(17)佞巧。参见“懷給”。
(18)馈赠；赠送。
(19)见“懷遲”。
(20)姓。三国吴有尚书郎怀叙。见《三国志·吴志·顾雍传》。

懷字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　懷； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页408第17
〔古文〕褱【唐韻】戸乖切【集韻】【韻會】乎乖切，?音槐。【說文】念思也。从心褱聲。【論語】君子懷德。又歸也。【書·大禹謨】黎民懷之。【註】歸之也。　又來也。【詩·齊風】曷又懷止。又【周頌】懷柔百神。【註】懷，來也。　又安也。【書·秦誓】邦之榮懷。【詩·王風】懷哉懷哉。　又包也。【書·堯典】蕩蕩懷山襄陵。　又藏也。【論語】懷其寶，而迷其邦。【禮·曲禮】其有核者，懷其核。　又慰也。【詩·檜風】懷之好音。　又懷抱，胷臆也。【左傳·成十七年】瓊瑰盈吾懷乎。【論語】然後免於父母之懷。　又傷也。【詩·邶風】願言則懷。【毛傳】懷，傷也。　又私也。【詩·小雅】每懷靡及。【箋】懷，私也。　又【爾雅·釋詁】至也。【註】齊魯之會郊曰懷。【詩·小雅】懷允不忘。【箋】至也。至信不忘。　又【爾雅·釋詁】止也。【疏】至止也。　又【釋名】懷，回也。本有去意，回來就已也。亦言歸也，來歸已也。　又【諡法】慈仁哲行曰懷。又地名。【書·禹貢】覃懷底績。　又州名。春秋時野王邑，漢河內郡，

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Cherish
huái

Cherish
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［huái］
["Guangyun" households are obediently cut, flat, boxed. ]
Also known as "懐1". Traditional characters for "怀1". The present word for "褢1".
(1) Miss; miss.
(2) The extension is nostalgia and love.
(3) Holding a grudge.
(4) On the chest; in the arms.
(5) Tolerance; surround.
(6) Mind; embrace.
(7) Embrace.
(8) Refers to being in the heart.
(9) Hiding; forbearance.
(10) Pregnancy, pregnancy.
(11) Affection; Mind.
(12) Refers to the heart, the heart.
(13) Return.
(14) The extension is to come, to.
(15) Invite, solicit.
(16) To appease; to appease.
(17) Ning Qiao. See "Hearing to".
(18) Gift; gift.
(19) See "Being Late".
(20) Last name. Three Kingdoms Wu Youshang Shu Lang Huaixu. See "Three Kingdoms·Wu Zhi·Gu Yong Biography".
Cherish
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　 Huai; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 408 Page 17
〔古文〕褱【Tang Yun】戸obediently cut [Jiyun] [Rhyme will] almost obediently cut,? Yinhuai. [Said the text] Thinking about it. Sound from the heart. [The Analects] A gentleman has virtue. Go back again. 【Book·Dayu Mo】Li Min Huaizhi. [Note] Return to it.　 Come again. 【Poetry·Qi Feng】Jiang and Huaizhi. And [Zhou Song] Huai soft and hundred gods. [Note] Huai, come also.　You An Ye. [Book·Qin Oath] The glory of the state. 【Poetry·Wang Feng】Huai Zai Huai Zai.　Bao also. 【Book·Yaodian】Dangling Huaishan Xiangling.　Hidden again. [The Analects of Confucius] cherish its treasures while fascinated by its state. 【Rite·Cute】He who has a nucleus is pregnant with his nucleus.　It's comforting again. 【Poetry·Hinoki】The good sound of Huai.　Hugging again, crouching too. [Zuo Zhuan·Seventeen Years] Qiong Guiying is in my arms. [The Analects] Then save yourself from your parents.　It hurts again. 【Poetry·Bei Feng】If you wish, you will be cherished. [Mao Chuan] Embrace, hurt.　It's also private. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Every time you feel extravagant. 【Jian】Huai, private.　[Erya·Shi Xie] to the point. [Note] Qilu Zhihui Jiao said Huai. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Huaiyun never forgets. [Jan] to also. Never forget the letter.　[Erya·Shi Xuan] Stop also. [Sparse] to the end.　[Release name] Huai, return. I just wanted to go, I just came back. It's also home, it's home.　[Posthumous] Be kind, benevolent and philosophical. Also place name. [Book·Yugong] Tan Huai's performance.　Also the name of the state. In the Spring and Autumn Period, Ye Wangyi, Hanhe Noi County,
